items.summary: Replace the current 'Television Services' navigation option (in the sidebar, landing page card, and any related routing) with 'Request a Service'. The page title and all references should read 'Request a Service' throughout the app.

Update the service/work order categories on the 'Request a Service' page to include exactly these repair service types: Television Repair, AC Repair, Fridge Repair, Ceiling Fan Repair, and Table Fan Repair. These should be the selectable work detail/service type options available when a customer submits a service request.

Add the following preferred education options to the worker Job Apply multi-step form's 'Preferred Education' field: Electronic Commerce Engineering, AC Mechanic, Electrical Engineering, ITI (Electrician Trade), Diploma in Refrigeration & Air Conditioning, and Diploma in Electronics & Communication. These should appear as selectable options alongside any existing education options.
